Bot Role Powers: ChatDSA has the power to add roles to users.
Channels & Roles: The Channels & Roles channels allows users to assign server, color and notification roles to themselves
Missing Channel Access: If the user can't see a channel, direct them to 'Channels & Roles' to assign themselves roles
How to use Channels & Roles channel: Channels & Roles, is not like a normal discord channel, users can not chat in this channel, but it has a bunch of buttons, that will selected will assign roles and channels to the user based on selections
